title: Thrilling Murder Comics
medium: 36-page paperback bound volume with half-tone and offset lithograph illustrations in black and red on wove paper, with cover in full color
attribution: Various Artists, Simon Deitch (artist, author), Greg Irons (artist, author), Jim Osborne (artist, author), S.
